2011-01-08

BtVS: The Harvest / Decapitation by cymbal

Enjoyed The Harvest and it had two of my favourite vampire dustings (neither of which showed the death or the dust on screen)...

First up a staking with a pool cue...

... and shortly after a decapitation with a cymbal (sadly underrepresented on the otherwise wonderful Screencap Paradise)...
